transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha ji, boliye.
Customer: Ha ji sir. 
Executive: Aadarsh bol raha hu sir IndiaMART se aapke discussion chal raha tha na.
Customer: Ha ji, ha ji. Ha ji.
Executive: Mai ye puch raha hu aapka ek ye number hai aur ek dusra aur number hai 815 wala. Ye wo mere bhai ke paas hi hai.
Customer: Aapke bhai ka hai? 
Executive: Wo mere chhote bhai ke paas hai. Ha jaise jaise wo GS Expreser bhi uska hi pe hai. GS mera hi pe hai.
Executive: Achha. Matlab isme ye dusra wala number aapke brother ka hai sir.
Customer: Ha. Wo GS Expreser ka owner hai. To to aapne dono mobile me login kar rakha hai dono profile ya wo unhone apne usme profile me wo wali kar rakhi hai aapne ye wali chala rakhi hai. Nahi nahi aisa hai kya. Jaise jaise ha jaise meri wali GS wali meri hai aur GS wali uske phone number pe hai.
Executive: To aap aisa aur kar sakte ho sir ki ek to app jo aapke jo waha pe jo worker hai na unke me download kara do aur ek is number se 162 wale se na login kara do. Thik hai. Usme app me sir jaise aap login karaoge na to unke paas access aa jayega. Primary number aapka hi rahega thik hai. Main aapka hi rahega bas wo buylead consume kar payenge sir. Calls wagera sab aapke paas rahenge. Jab buylead regular basis pe consume hogi to fir. Ya aisa karu meri ghar wali meri ghar wali veli baithi hai uske phone pe kar du. Ha kar do kar do kar do sir. Kya ek do buylead consume kar legi kuch to profit aayega na sir.
Customer: Ha chalo wo veli baithi hai ghar pe padhe likhe hoke ghar bithaye hum logo ne. Ha ha ha ha ye kar lo sir. Thik hai.
Customer: Hai na aise kar lete hai.
Executive: Ha aise kar lo sir. Thik hai. Hai na unko bolunga call pe rehna jab bhi aayega bas button dabana bas chahe kuch bhi na karo.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul bas itna kar lena sir. Thik hai. Aise karke dekh lete hai ye hai option thik hai. Ha. Mera ghar ka ghar pe reh gaya aur number bhi koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Ha ha ha bas yehi ho jayega.
Customer: Kar leta hu aise kar lete hai. Thik hai. Thik hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has two numbers, wants to manage buyleads.

- Wants to utilize buyleads effectively.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using the app on worker's phones.

- Suggested using wife's phone to consume buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer agreed to try the suggested solutions.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, app, login, profile, number
